title: 2 rooms available in 3bed, 1bath apt starting Aug. 1
posting_body: ['I am a grad student looking for 2 new roommates to join me in a 3bed, 1 bathroom apartment starting August 1st.', 'Features:', 'No broker’s fee', 'Central AC+Heat', 'Dishwasher', 'Small balcony', 'Wash/Dry on first floor (coin-op)', 'Street Parking with city permit', 'Assigned Parking spot in lot (+$100)', 'Open to pets (pending landlord approval)', 'Location is right off Beacon St and is:', '~1min walk to Star Market, ~10min walk from Porter Sq,', '~15min from Harvard Sq.', '83 and 87 bus lines within 5min walk', 'Logistics:', 'Rent: $1100/person (paid separately via online portal)', 'Utilities (elec+gas): ~$150/month', 'Wifi: $74.87/month', 'To move-in: 1st month rent and security deposit', "Folks you'd be living with:", 'Matthew: I am a public policy grad student.', 'I typically keep to myself at home but love chatting about video games, movies, and sports.', 'I am hoping to find roommates that are clean and easy-going.', 'Please send a message if you are interested!']
